Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enacting the New York city plumbing code based on the 2003 edition of the International Plumbing Code published by the International Code Council and enacting administrative provisions applicable to such New York city plumbing code and to such other codes as may hereafter be enacted by the city based on the 2003 editions of the International Building Code, the International Fuel Gas Code, the International Mechanical Code, and the International Residential Code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide a time frame for the adoption and periodic updating of a modern construction code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of a temporary fuel-saving program.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a temporary fuel-saving program.

Items.Title: Resolution determining that Proposed Int. No. 478-A, a Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enacting the New York city plumbing code based on the 2003 edition of the International Plumbing Code published by the International Code Council and enacting administrative provisions applicable to such New York city plumbing code and to such other codes as may hereafter be enacted by the city based on the 2003 editions of the International Building Code, the International Fuel Gas Code, the International Mechanical Code and the International Residential Code, will not have a significant adverse impact on the environment.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide a time frame for the adoption and periodic updating of a modern construction code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enacting the New York city plumbing code based on the 2003 edition of the International Plumbing Code published by the International Code Council and enacting administrative provisions applicable to such New York city plumbing code and to such other codes as may hereafter be enacted by the city based on the 2003 editions of the International Building Code, the International Fuel Gas Code, the International Mechanical Code, and the International Residential Code.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide a time frame for the adoption and periodic updating of a modern construction code.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the creation of a temporary fuel-saving program.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creation of a temporary fuel-saving program.

Items.Title: Resolution determining that Proposed Int. No. 478-A, a Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enacting the New York city plumbing code based on the 2003 edition of the International Plumbing Code published by the International Code Council and enacting administrative provisions applicable to such New York city plumbing code and to such other codes as may hereafter be enacted by the city based on the 2003 editions of the International Building Code, the International Fuel Gas Code, the International Mechanical Code and the International Residential Code, will not have a significant adverse impact on the environment.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Provide a time frame for the adoption and periodic updating of a modern construction code.
